name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meetly: Meeting Notes for Calendar & Meet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write and send meeting notes from your calendar and meet calls, recurring meeting notes, and never lose your chat messages again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Write and send meeting notes from your calendar and meet calls, pull up past notes in recurring meetings, and never lose your chat messages again.

WHAT MEETLY OFFERS
  -  🖋 Collaborate on meeting notes directly in Google Meet
  -  🚀 Mentions and tags - @mention meeting participants or #tag meetings
  -  💬 Syncs your google meet chats so you can access them anytime
  -  ✅ Build accountability with assigned action items
  -  ⚡️ Quickly prepare for upcoming meetings
  -  💥 Seamless - share your notes with some or all meeting participants via
        email.
  -  🏃‍♀️Run effective meetings with a clear purpose, agenda, and outcomes

-------

GOOGLE MEET INTEGRATION 📞

Access meeting notes right from your google meet screen. No more toggling tabs and missing out an important conversation.

GOOGLE CALENDAR INTEGRATION 🗓

Enrich your meetings by adding context to them via notes right from your google calendar.

-------

HOW TO GET STARTED ⭐

- Install the Meetly chrome extension
- Go to your Google Calendar
- Open the Meetly sidebar and login
- Meetly will ask for Calendar permission when you login
- Once logged in, click on any meeting to start taking notes.
